Clearing Recent Apps Pass: Test0 Pass for clearing Recent apps Launch File Manager Application and clear internal memory Swipe up and select uSD card Select Internal storage Click more options Click select all Select delete option Accept delete pop-up Pass: Clearing phone internal memory is successfull Calling Image() for rear Image capture in uSD Card and Verify the Captured images  Launch Camera Application for Rear camera picture capture Select settings option Select Storagepath option Select SD as storage option Captureing default resolition image 0 Captureing default resolition image 1 Captureing default resolition image 2 Captureing default resolition image 3 Captureing default resolition image 4 Captureing default resolition image 5 Captureing default resolition image 6 Captureing default resolition image 7 Captureing default resolition image 8 Captureing default resolition image 9 Captureing default resolition image 10 Captureing default resolition image 11 Captureing default resolition image 12 Captureing default resolition image 13 Captureing default resolition image 14 Captureing default resolition image 15 Captureing default resolition image 16 Captureing default resolition image 17 Captureing default resolition image 18 Captureing default resolition image 19 Captureing default resolition image 20 Captureing default resolition image 21 Captureing default resolition image 22 Captureing default resolition image 23 Captureing default resolition image 24 25 image capture is successfull Launch File Manager application to verify Image capture Select SD Card Select DCIM Folder Select Camera Folder Select More Options Click On Select All Options Pass:Total Number Of Image captured 25 is successfull Calling video() for rear video recording in USD card and verifying data capture.
